actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional bankruptcy judge for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to provide an additional bankruptcy judge for the eastern district of California. Expresses the sense of Congress that bankruptcy judges should conduct bankruptcy proceedings on a daily basis in Bakersfield, California.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional bankruptcy judge for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.
